Parameters.description: Parameters for the TAKE_FROM_CONTAINER operation. Takes an item from a container and adds it to the actor's inventory. The container must be open and the item must be in the container's contents.

actorEntity.description: Entity ID of the actor taking the item

containerEntity.description: Entity ID of the container being taken from

itemEntity.description: Entity ID of the item being taken

result_variable.description: Optional variable name to store the operation result. Result includes {success: boolean, error?: string}
